datasetDescription.description: A brief summary of the dataset, including its intended use, supported tasks, an overview of how and why the dataset was created, etc.

datasetStructure.description: List and describe the fields present in the dataset.

items.description: A short paragraph describing and summarizing the dataset field. The paragraph should start with the name, then a colon, then a description of the field including units and datatypes.

sourceData.description: The source data (e.g. news text and headlines, social media posts, translated sentences, etc.), including the data collection process, and data producer.

personalAndSensitiveInformation.description: Statement of whether the dataset contains other data that might be considered sensitive (e.g., data that reveals racial or ethnic origins, financial or health data, etc.).

discussionOfBiases.description: Discussion of any biases present in the data (e.g., missing data, imbalanced classes, label noise, etc.).

otherKnownLimitations.description: Any other limitations in the data.

datasetCurators.description: The people involved in collecting the dataset and their affiliation(s).

licensingInformation.description: The license and link to the license webpage if available.

citationInformation.description: The BibTex-formatted reference for the dataset.

additionalLinks.description: Additional links related to the dataset.
